sentences.en: An osmotic mutant of Neurospora was permeable to polymers of molecular weight 18500.
sentences.cn: 脉孢壳属的渗透突变体能透过分子量为18500的聚合物.

sentences.en: Neurospora can be grown in test tubes containing a very simple culture medium.
sentences.cn: 链孢霉可以在含有一种很简单的培养基的试管中生长.

sentences.en: The life cycle of Neurospora is shown in Fig 1.1.
sentences.cn: 图11概括了链孢霉的生活史.
